text: Gumazitam arazir aghuim damutɨ, gumaziba ti a ikaragh arazir kuram a danɨngam, o? Puvatɨ. Eghtɨ gumazir kaba na gasɨghasigham, me mati gumazim mozim gutui, eghtɨ asɨzim atamakuigh an magɨrɨgham. Nɨ, arazir kɨ fomɨra amizim gɨnɨghnɨgh. Kɨ nɨn boroghɨra iza me bagha nɨn azangsɨgha ghaze, nɨ uan anɨngagharim agɨvagh, gumazamizir kaba deraghvɨra me damu.
